CustomField.formula: IF(!ISBLANK(Run_Valuation_Report__c) , 1, 0) + IF(Send_both_NM_and_M__c, 1, 0) + IF(Roth_Report_Run__c , 1, 0) + IF(Loan_Report_Run__c , 1, 0) + IF (!ISBLANK(Valuation_Report_Sent__c) , 1, 0) + IF(!ISBLANK(Send_to_CAM_for_Valuation_Edit__c) , 1, 0) + IF(Valuation_Report_Run_After_Edit__c , 1, 0)
CustomField.label: Count of Reports Sent
